name: Fresh
description:
Basically you play a lemon, your goal is to make it to the blender!Watch out for spikes and munches that will try to stop you!

Controls are the arrow keys. Full screen in highly Recommended! For some reason the buttons are broken.. they work in Construct but they break whenever i export them :(. The first 2 buttons will start the game and next level, then the button on the left re-starts the game and the one on the right takes you to some bonus levels!

(2nd Game jam!)

Full Play through + Bonus levels:
